00025 #include "OgreArchiveManager.h"
00026 
00027 #include "OgreArchiveFactory.h"
00028 #include "OgreArchiveEx.h"
00029 #include "OgreException.h"
00030 #include "OgreLogManager.h"
00031 
00032 namespace Ogre {
00033     typedef void (*createFunc)( ArchiveEx**, const String& );
00034 
00035     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00036     template<> ArchiveManager* Singleton<ArchiveManager>::ms_Singleton = 0;
00037     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 
00039     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00040     ArchiveEx* ArchiveManager::load( const String& filename, const String& archiveType, int priority /* =1 */ )
00041     {
00042         ArchiveEx* pArch = (ArchiveEx*)(getByName(filename));
00043         if (!pArch)
00044         {
00045             // Search factories
00046             ArchiveFactoryMap::iterator it = mArchFactories.find(archiveType);
00047             if (it == mArchFactories.end())
00048                 // Factory not found
00049                 Except(Exception::ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, "Cannot find an archive factory "
00050                     "to deal with archive of type " + archiveType, "ArchiveManager::load");
00051 
00052             pArch = it->second->createObj( 1, filename );
00053 
00054             ResourceManager::load(pArch, priority);
00055         }
00056         return pArch;
00057     }
00058 
00059     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00060     Resource* ArchiveManager::create( const String& name ) {
00061         return NULL;
00062     }
00063 
00064     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00065     ArchiveManager& ArchiveManager::getSingleton(void)
00066     {
00067         return Singleton<ArchiveManager>::getSingleton();
00068     }
00069 
00070     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00071     ArchiveManager::~ArchiveManager()
00072     {
00073         // Unload & delete resources in turn
00074         for( ResourceMap::iterator it = mResources.begin(); it != mResources.end(); ++it )
00075         {
00076             it->second->unload();
00077         }
00078 
00079         // Empty the list
00080         mResources.clear();
00081     }
00082     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00083     void ArchiveManager::addArchiveFactory(ArchiveFactory* factory)
00084     {        
00085         mArchFactories.insert( ArchiveFactoryMap::value_type( factory->getType(), factory ) );
00086         LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("ArchiveFactory for archive type " +     factory->getType() + " registered.");
00087     }
00088 
00089 }
